log_test_cases.description: Verify there is fault trace in appointment-service-get trace segments (Scenario 1)
log_test_cases.query_string: fields @timestamp, traceId, endTimeUnixNano/1000000 as timestamp, spanId, name, coalesce(attributes.http.response.status_code, attributes.http.status_code, status.code) as statusCode, durationNano/1000000 as duration| filter attributes.aws.local.service="appointment-service-get" and attributes.aws.local.environment = "lambda:default"  and attributes.aws.local.operation = "appointment-service-get/FunctionHandler" and not ispresent(attributes.aws.remote.service) and (statusCode>=500 or statusCode="ERROR")  | limit 10

log_test_cases.description: Verify specific prompt exists in Customers-service-java logs (Scenario 3)
log_test_cases.query_string: fields @timestamp, @message | filter @message like /What are the best preventive measures for common cat diseases/ | limit 1

validation_checks.expected_value: What are the best preventive measures for common cat diseases?

log_test_cases.cli_command_hint: aws logs start-query / aws logs get-query-results ...
log_test_cases.notes: Corresponds to PDF scenario 3. Verify log group name.

log_test_cases.description: Verify owner.id in payment service logs (Scenario 4)
log_test_cases.query_string: fields @timestamp, @message,traceId, endTimeUnixNano/1000000 as timestamp, spanId, name, coalesce(attributes.http.response.status_code, attributes.http.status_code, status.code) as statusCode, durationNano/1000000 as duration| filter attributes.aws.local.service="payment-service-dotnet" and attributes.aws.local.environment = "ENVIRONMENT_NAME_PLACEHOLDER"  and attributes.aws.local.operation = "GET /owners/{ownerId:int}/pets/{petId:int}/payments" and not ispresent(attributes.aws.remote.service) and statusCode>=400 and statusCode<500  | limit 10
log_test_cases.notes: Corresponds to PDF scenario 4. Requires correlating with order id found via X-Ray search. Verify log group name.

log_test_cases.description: Verify ProvisionedThroughputExceededException in visits-service-java logs (Scenario 6)
log_test_cases.query_string: fields @message, traceId, endTimeUnixNano/1000000 as timestamp, spanId, name, coalesce(attributes.http.response.status_code, attributes.http.status_code, status.code) as statusCode, durationNano/1000000 as duration | filter attributes.aws.local.service="visits-service-java" and attributes.aws.local.environment = "ENVIRONMENT_NAME_PLACEHOLDER"  and attributes.aws.local.operation = "POST /owners/{ownerId}/pets/{petId}/visits" and not ispresent(attributes.aws.remote.service) and (statusCode>=500 or statusCode="ERROR")  #no-attribute-selected | limit 10

validation_checks.expected_value: The level of configured provisioned throughput for the table was exceeded.

log_test_cases.notes: Corresponds to PDF scenario 6. Verify error message.

log_test_cases.description: Verify container metrics integration (Scenario 7)
log_test_cases.query_string: fields @timestamp, traceId, endTimeUnixNano/1000000 as timestamp, spanId, name, coalesce(attributes.http.response.status_code, attributes.http.status_code, status.code) as statusCode, durationNano/1000000 as duration | filter attributes.aws.local.service="pet-clinic-frontend-java" and attributes.aws.local.environment = "ENVIRONMENT_NAME_PLACEHOLDER"  and attributes.aws.local.operation = "POST /api/customer/owners" and not ispresent(attributes.aws.remote.service)  | sort duration asc | limit 10

log_test_cases.description: Verify SQS error logs (Scenario 8)
log_test_cases.query_string: fields @timestamp, traceId, endTimeUnixNano/1000000 as timestamp, spanId, name, coalesce(attributes.http.response.status_code, attributes.http.status_code, status.code) as statusCode, durationNano/1000000 as duration | filter attributes.aws.local.service="customers-service-java" and attributes.aws.local.environment = "ENVIRONMENT_NAME_PLACEHOLDER"  and attributes.aws.remote.service = "AWS::SQS" and attributes.aws.remote.operation = "PurgeQueue" and attributes.aws.remote.resource.identifier = "apm_test" and statusCode>=400 and statusCode<500 | limit 10
